UnprotectSovereignData.logSuccess: Authorized Access: PII trace decrypted with integrity for journey {correlationIdentifier}.
UnprotectSovereignData.errorTampering: CRITICAL ALERT: Tampering attempt detected. The cryptographic trace was altered or the master key is invalid.
UnprotectSovereignData.errorMasterKey: Cryptographic Inability: Sovereignty master key not located in the environment.
UnprotectSovereignData.errorVersion: Protocol Violation: Cipher algorithm version is incompatible.
